description: This table stores discrete diagnosis information received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: DX_ENC_ID
columns.description: Reference ID of the encounter associated with this diagnosis.

columns.name: DX_CONTEXT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of diagnosis.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Admitting Diagnosis


Discharge Diagnosis


Encounter Diagnosis


Result Order

columns.name: DX_SRC_CSN
columns.description: Contains the Contact Serial Number (CSN) of the source external document record that has the external diagnosis information.

columns.name: DX_LST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last update instant of the diagnosis in UTC.

columns.name: DX_PRIMARY_YN
columns.description:
Denotes if this diagnosis is the primary diagnosis. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DX_FILTER_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason why an external diagnosis should be filtered from the composite external document record


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Claim Derivation: Procedure Code Inclusion/Exclusion List


Claim Derivation: Missing Provider


Claim Derivation: Sensitive Diagnosis


Claim Derivation: Missing Procedure Start Date


Claim Derivation: Excluded Procedure Modifier


Source Organization Unknown


Source Organization Mismatch


Source Organization Is Self


Clinical Note Type Exclusion List


Clinical Note Missing Service Instant


Clinical Note Missing Last Filed Instant


Clinical Note Missing Author Name


Dispense Cancellation


Same Day as Internal Encounter


Missing or Invalid Binary URL


Filtered or Missing Source Note


DocumentReference Status not Current


Claim Derivation: Excluded Linked Diagnoses


Claim Derivation: Missing Encounter Start Date

columns.name: DX_IS_ED_YN
columns.description:
Denotes if this diagnosis was made in the ED.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DX_PRIMARY_YN
